玩.definition: to play; to have fun; to trifle with; toy; sth used for amusement; curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4]); to keep sth for entertainment

玩不起.definition: can't afford to play; (fig.) can't accept it when one loses

玩世不恭.definition: to trifle without respect (idiom); to despise worldly conventions; frivolous

玩人喪德.definition: to play with others and offend morals; wicked

玩偶.definition: toy figurine; action figure; stuffed animal; doll; (fig.) sb's plaything

玩偶之家.definition: Doll's House (1879), drama by Ibsen 易卜生

玩兒.definition: to play; to have fun; to hang out

玩兒不轉.definition: can't handle it; can't find any way (of doing sth); not up to the task

玩兒命.definition: to gamble with life; to take reckless risks

玩兒得轉.definition: can handle it; up to the task

玩完.definition: (coll.) to end in failure; to come to grief; to bite the dust

玩家.definition: player (of a game); enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)

玩弄.definition: to play with; to toy with; to dally with; to engage in; to resort to

玩弄詞藻.definition: to juggle with words (dishonestly); to be a hypocrite and hide behind florid rhetoric

玩忽.definition: to neglect; to trifle with; not to take seriously

玩忽職守.definition: to neglect one's duty; dereliction of duty; malpractice

玩意.definition: toy; plaything; thing; act; trick (in a performance, stage show, acrobatics etc)

玩意兒.definition: erhua variant of 玩意[wan2 yi4]

玩手腕.definition: to play tricks; to play at politics

玩樂.definition: to play around; to disport oneself

玩法.definition: to play fast and loose with the law; to game the system; (leisure) rules of the game; way of doing an activity; (tourism) way of experiencing a place

玩火自焚.definition: to play with fire and get burnt (idiom); fig. to play with evil and suffer the consequences; to get one's fingers burnt

玩牌.definition: to play cards; to play mahjong

玩物喪志.definition: lit. trifling destroys the will (idiom); infatuation with fine details prevents one making progress; excessive attention to trivia saps the will

玩狎.definition: to trifle; to dally with; to treat casually; to jest

玩索.definition: to search for subtle traces; to ponder

玩耍.definition: to play (as children do); to amuse oneself

玩興.definition: interest in dallying; in the mood for playing

玩藝兒.definition: variant of 玩意兒|玩意儿[wan2 yi4 r5]

玩賞.definition: to appreciate; to take pleasure in; to enjoy

玩轉.definition: to know all the ins and outs of sth; to get to know (a place) inside out

玩遍.definition: to visit (a large number of places); to tour around (the whole country, the whole city etc)
